1362070.name: Maenovan
1362070.description:
About This Game

Thirty years ago, the idyllic Maenovan Valley was ravaged by a mysterious sickness, forcing a mass evacuation. The once-thriving community was left abandoned, its secrets buried beneath an unsettling silence.

The year is 2007. You are lured to the valley by the abundance of prey and the promise of a successful hunt. As you explore the decaying remnants of the past, you'll uncover a haunting narrative that reveals the darkness that still lingers in the valley's shadows.

Gameplay:

  • Atmospheric Exploration: Immerse yourself in the eerie atmosphere of the abandoned valley and its surrounding areas. Explore decaying buildings, forgotten landmarks, and the unsettling remnants of a once-vibrant community.

  • Unraveling the Mystery: Piece together the fragmented narrative through environmental storytelling, cryptic clues, and chilling encounters. Discover the truth behind the valley's evacuation and the lingering darkness that haunts its present.

  • Suspenseful Encounters: Brace yourself for spine-chilling moments as you navigate the valley's eerie silence and confront the unsettling remnants of its past

  • Run, Hide, or Fight: Use whit and cooperation to overcome a variety of threats in riveting adrenaline-filled sequences. 

Features:

  • Multiplayer Adventure: Play solo, or work with up to six friends to accomplish your mission while the forces of nature work against you.

  • Immersive Sound Design: Chilling ambient sounds will immerse you in the valley's eerie atmosphere, heightening the suspense and tension.

  • Difficult and Repeatable Gameplay: Work together with friends to reach all of the possible game endings at varying difficulties. Can you be the best?

  • Compelling Narrative: A rich and atmospheric narrative will unfold as you explore, revealing the valley's dark secrets and the tragic fate of its former inhabitants.

  • Indie Spirit: Developed with a passion for storytelling and a commitment to creating a unique and unforgettable horror experience.

英语*
